mapper.select: select id as id, user_id as userId, mobile as mobile, auth_id as authId, cp_service_id as cpServiceId, cp_id as cpId, keymd5 as keymd5, channel_id as channelId, add_time as addTime, content_info as contentInfo, region as region, craft_name as craftName, driver_name as driverName, person_name as personName from air_user_ext WHERE 1 = 1

select id as id, user_id as userId, mobile as mobile, auth_id as authId, cp_service_id as cpServiceId, cp_id as cpId, keymd5 as keymd5, channel_id as channelId, add_time as addTime, content_info as contentInfo, region as region, craft_name as craftName, driver_name as driverName, person_name as personName from air_user_ext WHERE auth_id = #{authId}
